TopicTitle: SuestraGaming and Macey Dean are back! [Misleading Title]

Articles.Content:
Susetra is back, also explaining what happened to Macey.

Here is his latest teaser:

[Moderator Comment - This video is by Hatbat and does not reference Susetra or Macey Dean

Edited November 30, 2014 by sal_vager

I'm not sure if it's appropriate to "Report" someone for being misleading, but if I would, I could.

This is a project done primarily by HatBat, not Macey Dean or Suestra. It even says so in the credits. I'm not entirely sure what you're intending to do by spreading misinformation.

I would strongly recommend asking the mods to close this down before you get too many replies like this one.

-Upsilon

You got me incredibly happy for a second. ;_;

At least watch the goddamn video before posting it with such a title.

This is pretty misleading and I don't think Hatbat would appreciate it either.

I'll fix it.
